about.title: Our
about.storyText1: Founded in 2015, Harika Spices began with a simple vision: to bring the vibrant flavors of Indonesian spices to the global culinary stage while empowering local farmers and preserving traditional harvesting methods.
about.storyText2: What started as a small family-owned business has now grown into an internationally recognized brand that bridges the gap between traditional spice cultivation and modern global cuisine.
